title: Horror Suspense Pack
description: Spine-Chilling Soundtrack Music for Horror Games
longDescription:
Horror Suspense Pack


This pack is comprised of 14 meticulously crafted horror music pieces. The majority of the tracks are short in duration but rich in dramatic progression, making them perfect for specific gameplay situations or particular cutscenes in your storyline. Tracks like Creature, Tick Tock, or 60 Seconds are especially fitting for moments where tension needs to be built or where the player is supposed to feel a certain amount of pressure. Other tracks like Mad Clown, Alienship, and The Door are more action-packed.

On top of that, it includes the Unreal Bonus Pack consisting of 4 incredibly hard-hitting horror trailer music pieces and two spine-chillingly atmospheric horror soundscapes. Whereas the latter can be used as pause music or menu music, the trailer music can be used to advertise your game!


All tracks are professionally produced, mixed and mastered and come in a ready-to-use Unreal Engine project including WAVs and CUEs. No presets, loops or templates were used. You won't find these types of sounds anywhere else!


Listen to the tracks included in the Horror Suspense Pack here:

https://youtu.be/CIh69l7AB-o


Listen to the tracks included in the Unreal Bonus Pack here:

https://youtu.be/I0CO3igAsLQ


Tracklist:

01 - The Beginning

02 - The First Encounter

03 - 60 Seconds

04 - Transformation

05 - Mad Clowns

06 - Creature

07 - Drawing

08 - Alienship

09 - Below The Ground

10 - Suspicious

11 - Tick Tock

12 - Bloodlust

13 - Zombie Rise

14 - The Door


If you use my music, feel free to share your final product with me. I'd love to see how everything turned out!


Happy developing! 

Matt from Skilly Music
